product_name: Rollerblade Spitfire Aluminum Adjustable Inline Skates - Kids' - 2014 Seconds
long_description: Perfect for indoor or outdoor use on a variety of surfaces, these high-performance inline skates have an adjustable shell that allows the skates to grow along with your kids' feet.
